thread.title: EastEnders passion for Bex and Michelle's illegal boyfriend Preston? | Metro News
thread.title_full: EastEnders passion for Bex and Michelle's illegal boyfriend Preston? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders passion for Bex and Michelle's illegal boyfriend Preston? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 8:25 pm (Picture: BBC) 
EastEnders have hinted at a possible romance between Bex Fowler and newcomer Preston in the wake of Michelle kicking him to the kerb – but how far will things go before Michelle finally admits to her loved ones who her student lover really is? 
Michelle engaged in an illegal relationship with her 17-year-old pupil in the States and he recently followed her to Walford. Michelle has hidden the fact that he is her younger lover and the pair have sneakily been stealing passionate moments together. 
But when Michelle’s past scuppered her chances of a teaching role, reality hit home and Michelle told Preston that he would have to go home. (Picture: BBC) 
Preston was less than impressed and, as he stormed out after making sacrifices to be with Michelle, a passing Louise Mitchell suggested to Bex that she could move on from Shakil Kazemi by pursuing a romance with Preston. 
Hurting from being ditched by Michelle, will Preston respond to advances from Bex? And, if so, how might Michelle react? 
EastEnders continues on Friday 17th February at 8pm on BBC One.
